name: blade_parser
desc: Laravel Blade template parser library.

name: AlpineAttribute
desc: Alpine.js attribute (x-data, x-show, @click, :bind, etc.).

name: AlpineAttribute.new
desc: Creates an Alpine.js attribute.

name: directive
desc: The Alpine.js directive type (e.g., "data", "show", "click").

name: toJson
desc: Convert this attribute to JSON representation.

name: AstNode
desc: Base class for all AST (Abstract Syntax Tree) nodes.

name: accept
desc: Accept a visitor for traversing the AST.

name: children
desc: Child nodes contained within this node.

name: endPosition
desc: The ending position of this node in the source template.

name: parent
desc: The parent node, or null if this is the root document node.

name: startPosition
desc: The starting position of this node in the source template.

name: toJson
desc: Convert this node to a JSON representation.

name: AstVisitor
desc: Visitor pattern interface for traversing AST nodes.

name: visitComment
desc: Visit a comment node ({{-- --}} or ).

name: visitComponent
desc: Visit a component node ().

name: visitDirective
desc: Visit a Blade directive node (@if, @foreach, etc.).

name: visitDocument
desc: Visit a document (root) node.

name: visitEcho
desc: Visit an echo node ({{ }} or {!! !!}).

name: visitError
desc: Visit an error node (represents a parsing error).

name: visitHtmlElement
desc: Visit an HTML element node (

name: visitSlot
desc: Visit a slot node (component slot definition).

name: visitText
desc: Visit a text node (plain text content).

name: AttributeNode
desc: Base class for HTML/component attribute nodes.

name: name
desc: The attribute name (e.g., "class", "x-data", "wire:click").

name: toJson
desc: Convert this attribute to JSON representation.

name: value
desc: The attribute value, if any.

name: BladeFormatter
desc: Main formatter class for Blade templates.

name: BladeFormatter.new
desc: Creates a new Blade formatter with the given configuration.

name: config
desc: The formatting configuration to use.

name: format
desc: Formats a Blade template source string.

name: formatWithResult
desc: Formats source code and returns a FormatResult.

name: needsFormatting
desc: Checks if a source string needs formatting.

name: BladeLexer
desc:
Lexer for Blade templates using iterative state machine.
Converts from recursive Rob Pike pattern to iterative loop to prevent stack overflow.

name: tokenize
desc: Tokenize the input string into a list of tokens.

name: BladeParser
desc: Parser for Blade templates using recursive descent.

name: parse
desc: Parse a Blade template string.

name: CommentNode
desc: Comment node representing Blade ({{-- --}}) or HTML () comments.

name: CommentNode.new
desc: Creates a new comment node.

name: accept
desc: Accept a visitor for traversing the AST.

name: children
desc: Child nodes contained within this node.

name: content
desc: The comment text content.

name: endPosition
desc: The ending position of this node in the source template.

name: isBladeComment
desc: Whether this is a Blade comment ({{-- --}}) or HTML comment ().

name: parent
desc: The parent node, or null if this is the root document node.

name: startPosition
desc: The starting position of this node in the source template.

name: toJson
desc: Convert this node to a JSON representation.

name: ComponentNode
desc: Blade component node representing <x-component> tags.

name: ComponentNode.new
desc: Creates a new component node.

name: accept
desc: Accept a visitor for traversing the AST.

name: attributes
desc: Map of attributes passed to the component.

name: children
desc: Child nodes contained within this node.

name: endPosition
desc: The ending position of this node in the source template.

name: isSelfClosing
desc: Whether this component is self-closing ().

name: name
desc: The component name (without the x- prefix).

name: parent
desc: The parent node, or null if this is the root document node.

name: slots
desc: Named slots defined within the component.

name: startPosition
desc: The starting position of this node in the source template.

name: toJson
desc: Convert this node to a JSON representation.

name: DirectiveNode
desc: Blade directive node representing directives like @if, @foreach, @section, etc.

name: DirectiveNode.new
desc: Creates a new directive node.

name: accept
desc: Accept a visitor for traversing the AST.

name: children
desc: Child nodes contained within this node.

name: endPosition
desc: The ending position of this node in the source template.

name: expression
desc: The expression/arguments passed to the directive, if any.

name: name
desc: The directive name (without the @ prefix).

name: parent
desc: The parent node, or null if this is the root document node.

name: startPosition
desc: The starting position of this node in the source template.

name: toJson
desc: Convert this node to a JSON representation.

name: DocumentNode
desc: Root document node representing the entire Blade template.

name: DocumentNode.new
desc: Creates a new document node.

name: accept
desc: Accept a visitor for traversing the AST.

name: children
desc: Child nodes contained within this node.

name: endPosition
desc: The ending position of this node in the source template.

name: parent
desc: The parent node, or null if this is the root document node.

name: startPosition
desc: The starting position of this node in the source template.

name: toJson
desc: Convert this node to a JSON representation.

name: EchoNode
desc: Echo node representing Blade echo statements ({{ }} and {!! !!}).

name: EchoNode.new
desc: Creates a new echo node.

name: accept
desc: Accept a visitor for traversing the AST.

name: children
desc: Child nodes contained within this node.

name: endPosition
desc: The ending position of this node in the source template.

name: expression
desc: The PHP expression to be echoed.

name: isRaw
desc: Whether this is a raw (unescaped) echo.

name: parent
desc: The parent node, or null if this is the root document node.

name: startPosition
desc: The starting position of this node in the source template.

name: toJson
desc: Convert this node to a JSON representation.

name: ErrorNode
desc: Error node representing a parsing error in the AST.

name: ErrorNode.new
desc: Creates a new error node.

name: accept
desc: Accept a visitor for traversing the AST.

name: children
desc: Child nodes contained within this node.

name: endPosition
desc: The ending position of this node in the source template.

name: error
desc: The error message describing what went wrong.

name: parent
desc: The parent node, or null if this is the root document node.

name: partialContent
desc: Partial content that was successfully parsed before the error.

name: startPosition
desc: The starting position of this node in the source template.

name: toJson
desc: Convert this node to a JSON representation.

name: ErrorSeverity
desc: Error severity levels for parse errors.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: FormatResult
desc: Result of a formatting operation.

name: errors
desc: List of parse errors, if any.

name: formatted
desc: The formatted source code.

name: hasErrors
desc: Whether any errors were encountered during formatting.

name: isSuccess
desc: Whether formatting was successful (no errors).

name: wasChanged
desc: Whether the source was changed by formatting.

name: FormatterConfig
desc: Configuration for the Blade formatter.

name: FormatterConfig.compact
desc: Creates a compact formatter configuration.

name: FormatterConfig.defaults
desc: Creates a default formatter configuration.

name: FormatterConfig.fromMap
desc: Creates a formatter configuration from a map.

name: FormatterConfig.new
desc: Creates a formatter configuration.

name: formatPhpExpressions
desc: Whether to format PHP expressions inside Blade syntax.

name: indentSize
desc: The number of spaces (or tab width) for indentation.

name: indentStyle
desc: Whether to use spaces or tabs for indentation.

name: maxLineLength
desc: Maximum line length before considering wrapping.

name: quoteStyle
desc: Preferred quote style for HTML attributes.

name: toMap
desc: Converts this configuration to a map.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: FormatterException
desc: Exception thrown when formatting fails.

name: message
desc: A description of the formatting error.

name: parseErrors
desc: Parse errors that caused the formatting to fail.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: HtmlElementNode
desc: Standard HTML element node like <div>, <p>, <img>, etc.

name: HtmlElementNode.new
desc: Creates a new HTML element node.

name: accept
desc: Accept a visitor for traversing the AST.

name: attributes
desc: Map of attributes on this element (HTML, Alpine.js, Livewire).

name: children
desc: Child nodes contained within this node.

name: endPosition
desc: The ending position of this node in the source template.

name: isSelfClosing
desc: Whether this element uses self-closing syntax ().

name: isVoid
desc: Whether this is a void element that cannot have children (e.g., br, img, input).

name: parent
desc: The parent node, or null if this is the root document node.

name: startPosition
desc: The starting position of this node in the source template.

name: tagName
desc: The HTML tag name in lowercase (e.g., "div", "p", "img").

name: toJson
desc: Convert this node to a JSON representation.

name: IndentStyle
desc: Style of indentation to use.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: JsonSerializerVisitor
desc:
Visitor that serializes an AST to JSON.
This is an alternative to calling toJson() directly on nodes.

name: defaultValue
desc:
Default value returned from visit methods.
Override this to provide a safe default for your visitor type.

name: defaultVisit
desc:
Default visit method called for nodes without specific handling.
Note: This does NOT traverse children - override visit methods to control traversal.

name: visitComment
desc: Visit a comment node ({{-- --}} or ).

name: visitComponent
desc: Visit a component node ().

name: visitDirective
desc: Visit a Blade directive node (@if, @foreach, etc.).

name: visitDocument
desc: Visit a document (root) node.

name: visitEcho
desc: Visit an echo node ({{ }} or {!! !!}).

name: visitError
desc: Visit an error node (represents a parsing error).

name: visitHtmlElement
desc: Visit an HTML element node (

name: visitSlot
desc: Visit a slot node (component slot definition).

name: visitText
desc: Visit a text node (plain text content).

name: LivewireAttribute
desc: Livewire attribute (wire:click, wire:model, etc.).

name: LivewireAttribute.new
desc: Creates a Livewire attribute.

name: action
desc: The Livewire action (e.g., "click", "model", "submit").

name: modifiers
desc: Modifiers applied to the action (e.g., "prevent", "debounce").

name: toJson
desc: Convert this attribute to JSON representation.

name: ParseError
desc: Represents a parsing error encountered during Blade template processing.

name: ParseError.new
desc: Creates a new parse error.

name: hint
desc: Optional hint suggesting how to fix the error.

name: message
desc: The error message describing what went wrong.

name: position
desc: The position in the source where the error occurred.

name: severity
desc: The severity level of the error (error or warning).

name: sourceContext
desc: Optional source code context around the error location.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: ParseResult
desc: Result of a Blade template parsing operation.

name: ParseResult.new
desc: Creates a new parse result.

name: ast
desc: The parsed abstract syntax tree, or null if parsing failed completely.

name: errors
desc: List of errors encountered during parsing.

name: isSuccess
desc: Whether parsing was successful (no errors).

name: warnings
desc: List of warnings encountered during parsing.

name: Position
desc: Represents a position in the source code.

name: column
desc: 1-based column number

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: line
desc: 1-based line number

name: offset
desc: 0-based character offset from file start

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: QuoteStyle
desc: Preferred quote style for HTML attributes.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: RecursiveAstVisitor
desc:
Base class for recursive AST visitors.
Provides default traversal logic for all node types.

name: defaultValue
desc:
Default value returned from visit methods.
Override this to provide a safe default for your visitor type.

name: defaultVisit
desc:
Default visit method called for nodes without specific handling.
Note: This does NOT traverse children - override visit methods to control traversal.

name: visitComment
desc: Visit a comment node ({{-- --}} or ).

name: visitComponent
desc: Visit a component node ().

name: visitDirective
desc: Visit a Blade directive node (@if, @foreach, etc.).

name: visitDocument
desc: Visit a document (root) node.

name: visitEcho
desc: Visit an echo node ({{ }} or {!! !!}).

name: visitError
desc: Visit an error node (represents a parsing error).

name: visitHtmlElement
desc: Visit an HTML element node (

name: visitSlot
desc: Visit a slot node (component slot definition).

name: visitText
desc: Visit a text node (plain text content).

name: SlotNode
desc: Slot node for defining named slots in Blade components.

name: SlotNode.new
desc: Creates a new slot node.

name: accept
desc: Accept a visitor for traversing the AST.

name: attributes
desc: Attributes passed to the slot.

name: children
desc: Child nodes contained within this node.

name: endPosition
desc: The ending position of this node in the source template.

name: name
desc: The slot name (e.g., "header", "footer", or "default").

name: parent
desc: The parent node, or null if this is the root document node.

name: startPosition
desc: The starting position of this node in the source template.

name: toJson
desc: Convert this node to a JSON representation.

name: StandardAttribute
desc: Standard HTML attribute like class, id, style, etc.

name: StandardAttribute.new
desc: Creates a standard HTML attribute.

name: toJson
desc: Convert this attribute to JSON representation.

name: TextNode
desc: Text node representing plain text content in the template.

name: TextNode.new
desc: Creates a new text node.

name: accept
desc: Accept a visitor for traversing the AST.

name: children
desc: Child nodes contained within this node.

name: content
desc: The text content.

name: endPosition
desc: The ending position of this node in the source template.

name: parent
desc: The parent node, or null if this is the root document node.

name: startPosition
desc: The starting position of this node in the source template.

name: toJson
desc: Convert this node to a JSON representation.

name: Token
desc: Represents a lexical token in a Blade template.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: TokenType
desc: Token types for Blade templates.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.
